item.title: How to install Jetbrains Toolbox?
item.description: üì¶ What is Jetbrains' Toolbox App The Toolbox App is the best way of installing any Jetbrains software and Android Studio, which I’v knowm so far. It let’s you to install with a click differents versions of the supported softaware, but it goes more that only that, Toolbox allows you to manage (auto) updates, change versions, have multiple version at the same time. ‚è¨ Download Visit the official web site site and click on the Download Buttom, which it detects automately your SO and continue downloading the corresponding version.
